pageTitle: Pearl Izumi Veer Jersey 2013 > Apparel > Jerseys > Men's Jerseys | Jenson USA
textBeforeTable: Semi Form Fit 100% polyester Sublimated graphics on selected panels Sunglass wipe sewn inside jersey One zippered side rear pocket Streamlined welded seams for optimal chafe free comfort Full length zipper for venting Direct-Vent panels provide superior ventilation Transfer fabric provides moisture management The conditions of the trail can change day to day creating unknown obstacles and intense terrain, forcing you to make quick decisions on where to veer your machine. Geared for serious riders and demanding conditions, the Pearl Izumi Veer Jersey is the pinnacle of trail top jerseys. The Pearl Izumi Veer Jersey features transfer fabric, Direct-Vent panels, and a full length zipper for most favorable ventilation and moisture management. The streamlined welded seams provide a chafe free ride. Shipping Store Availability Reviews Description
textAfterTable: Jenson USA ships worldwide, including APO/FPO addresses. For a quote, simply add the items you are interested in to your shopping cart and look for the "Shipping Options" box. You don't have to login or create an account to see shipping charges. Some manufacturers restrict where we can ship their products. If this item has shipping restrictions, they are listed below. If you'd like to buy an item that we cannot ship to your preferred address, we can accept your foreign credit card and ship to a USA address for you. Get free shipping with your $50 purchase today when you choose Standard Shipping at checkout. Please note this offer is only available to physical shipping addresses in the 48 continental United States (no PO Boxes), and oversize charges still apply on some heavy/large items
